### Mods

>[Agora Mystica](https://www.nexusmods.com/spellforceconquestofeo/mods/59) & [Lunar Augur](https://www.nexusmods.com/spellforceconquestofeo/mods/73). As creator.
A new archetype mod for Spellforce - Conquest of Eo. It adds a brand new dreams crafting archetype to play the game anew with. Lunar Augur is a complimentary mod for the third DLC, improving on the new mechanics.

>[Not Even Bones](https://www.nexusmods.com/spellforceconquestofeo/mods/58) & [Mortal Taxes](https://www.nexusmods.com/spellforceconquestofeo/mods/69) & [Guarded](https://www.nexusmods.com/spellforceconquestofeo/mods/70). As creator.
A collection of challenge mods for Spellforce - Conquest of Eo. It removes all enemy loot, adds more enemies on resources, and adds a recruitment cost to units. Made to have a high scarcity and difficulty.
